name: Optimity, Inc.
description: Developer of a corporate wellness platform designed to keep employees healthy and happy. The company's platform uses mobile apps and wearables to coach employees to build healthy habits with micro-actions during their daily routines, enabling employers to keep employees healthy, reduce attrition and improve productivity.
